laboratory_examinations.findings: 8-mm atrial septal defect with dilation of the right atrium and ventricle; left ventricular functions were normal.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Control echocardiography showed an enlarged left main coronary artery with a marked colour Doppler flow from the left coronary region to the right atrium.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Sinus rhythm with significant p waves.
Prominent pulmonary vascular shadows, cardiomegaly, absence of the radius bone in the right forearm, and the presence of spina bifida.
No chromosomal abnormalities or mutations related to Holt-Oram syndrome and Fanconi anaemia.
Did not detect any mutations related to Holt-Oram syndrome and Fanconi anaemia.
